summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4442 for the improvement of Sullivan Street, from 5th Avenue South to 7th Avenue South; by the construction of sewers, under Ordinance No. 52421, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
